about_the_game:
"Iron Danger Chronicles - Moratta" Graphic Novel


Based on the epics of Finnish folklore, this graphic novel details the background of the world of "Iron Danger" from Antheor's rebellion against the gods to the witch queen Lowhee's bitter vengeance.

Written by Pekka Lehtosaari
Art and colour by Matias Bergara & Patricio Delpeche

  • Two stories
  • 128 pages

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence, coarse language and mild adult themes.

detailed_description:

Based on the epics of Finnish folklore, this graphic novel details the background of the world of "Iron Danger" from Antheor's rebellion against the gods to the witch queen Lowhee's bitter vengeance.
